text:
@RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Hey, fvcktard, look at this. All those red areas? COVID-19 cases. See NY? Squint, maybe you can see it.
"Blue State" problem my ass. Republican problem more like. https://t.co/iTBWR07fnV
